title: A Turnaround Is Coming | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: A Turnaround Is Coming | Joel Osteen
description:
Nothing can stop what God has purposed for your life. He’s going to take what was meant for your harm and turn it to your advantage.  

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
